name: High Roller Tower Defense
description:
Controls:
___________

WASD - Movement
Space - Pick Up & Throw Dice, Buy New Dice in Camp

This is a tower defense title where you must move around to collect coins, throw dice, and avoid enemies. Your die roll determines what kind of tower it will behave as, and dice can be rerolled to get a new number. Or just throw it at an enemy to stun it!
